quote: Sometimes doing nothing today is doing something.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the notion that immediate action is always necessary, highlighting the power of patience.
suggested_hook: Why sometimes the best action is no action at all.

quote: Tell a story. Just tell the story about something.
why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the power of storytelling in engaging clients and differentiating yourself.
suggested_hook: How storytelling can transform your real estate business.
